title: React useCopyToClipboard Hook
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use the useCopyToClipboard hook in React to copy a given text to the clipboard. This hook is useful for implementing a 'copy to clipboard' functionality in web applications. We will also see how to use the useState, useCallback, and useEffect hooks in this implementation.

meta.title: Mastering React's useCopyToClipboard Hook
meta.description: Discover how to leverage the useCopyToClipboard hook in React to seamlessly implement a 'copy to clipboard' functionality in your web applications.
meta.keywords: react, clipboard, web development, copy, usecopytoclipboard
